mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_PASSWORD, U.USER_SEQ, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_TYPE_AS, DATE_FORMAT(U.USER_INS_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %I:%i:%s') USER_INS_DT, U.USER_DEL_YN, U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_PHONE, U.USER_ADDRESS, U.USER_PROFILE, U.USER_GENDER_MW, U.USER_GRADE, D.DPT_NAME FROM DIMS_USER AS U LEFT JOIN DIMS_DEPARTMENT D ON U.DPT_SEQ = D.DPT_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
